data.text: @GrantBergeron71 @AM800News @radiomike519 @drewdilkens @OmarAlghabra @GovCanHealth @Irek_K @jyduclos Shocking, they ignored it?  You don’t say. @jyduclos @marcomendicino @OmarAlghabra @manvirshokar @Irek_K @CPHO_Canada @JustinTrudeau @GovCanHealth
@ChadComartin @AM800News @jyduclos @marcomendicino @OmarAlghabra @Irek_K @manvirshokar @CPHO_Canada @JustinTrudeau Liberals don’t care. They play games.
@abwright52 @AM800News Why? Bc you are all vaxed. You need to stop complying.
@AM800News Yes. Let’s treat the vac like the flu shot. Let it be a persons choice. If it even works.

@AM800News Thanks to @radiomike519 for asking @drewdilkens what came about from last weeks border city mayors meeting on the topic.  As expected, @OmarAlghabra , @GovCanHealth , @Irek_K , @jyduclos ignored their plea to remove border tests for vaccinated travellers. 🤦🏻

@AM800News At a minimum, testing of vaccinated Canadians crossing after short border trips should have been dropped a long time back. Our leaders haven’t cared about the impact and still don’t today. @jyduclos @marcomendicino @OmarAlghabra @Irek_K @manvirshokar @CPHO_Canada @JustinTrudeau
@AM800News Those that end up voting "NO" should be mandated to vote "YES", otherwise face possible investigation into their political ideology. It's your "CHOICE" 🤔

@AM800News Absolutely! If I go visit my son and his family, we’ll be there maybe 4 hours, my husband has had 4 injections, I am triple vaxxed, my son and family are all triple vaxxed. We don’t shop in the states! Why do we need testing???
